text: Kurt Vogel Russell (born March 17, 1951) is an American actor. He has been in a relationship with Goldie Hawn since 1983. == Film == Year Title Role Notes 1980 Used Cars Rudy Russo 1981 Escape from New York Lieutenant S.D.
